association tagline: A Strasbourg-based association committed to books and narrative arts — the 5th art (literature), 7th art (cinema), and 9th art (comics) — in the Grand Est region.
association vision sentence: Au Passage du Livre creates spaces where words, images, and ideas circulate freely.
association mission sentence: Meetings, workshops, and cultural initiatives to foster a love of reading, support creativity, and bring all audiences together.
mission_1_description: We connect young people with the world of books through hands-on experiences that make literature lively and accessible.
mission_1_card_text: Creating encounters and meaningful experiences to open young minds to literature, stimulate creativity, and encourage a curious view of the world.
mission_2_description: Creating spaces for exchange between authors, artists, and audiences to encourage dialogue, transmission, and the discovery of creative journeys.
mission_2_card_text: Special moments to engage with authors and illustrators, explore their worlds and inspirations, and better understand creative processes.
mission_3_description: Highlighting visual and narrative arts through exhibitions, meetings, and creative moments.
mission_3_card_text: Discovering the work of illustrators and visual artists, exploring the relationship between image and storytelling, and showcasing contemporary graphic creation.
guests_description: Discover the speakers and artists taking part in our cultural events.
blog_description: Follow the latest news from Au Passage du Livre: upcoming events, festival highlights, ongoing projects, and cultural initiatives led by the association.
events_program_description: To download the complete 2025 events catalog, please click on 'Download PDF'.
archived_events_description: Discover our past events: readings, discussions, and cultural experiences that have shaped the life of the association.
fe_2026_description: Join our association for three unforgettable days of literature, culture, and exchange at the heart of Europe.
next_event_description: We invite you to join us at our upcoming event. If you're interested, please check the details to learn more.
events description: Discover all of our literary events and activities, past and upcoming — conversations, readings, and cultural experiences to explore and revisit.
upcoming events description: Discover our upcoming literary gatherings, including readings, discussions, and cultural experiences to enjoy and share.
event_speakers_description: Discover the speakers and artists taking part in our cultural events.
no_archive_available: No archives available at the moment
artists_speakers_description: Discover the talents who will bring our event to life. Renowned authors, passionate artists, and inspiring speakers await you.
press_news_description: Articles, interviews, and media coverage dedicated to Au Passage du Livre and its cultural initiatives.
press_article_title: Books, Games and Figurines for a True "Cultural Village"
press_article_excerpt: After its first edition in 2024, books return to the European Fair of Strasbourg, this time surrounded by board games and figurines…
contact_cta_paragraph: Have a question about the festival? Would you like to join us or become a partner? Our team is here to help.
message_sent_description: Thank you for contacting us. We will get back to you very soon.
data_consent: I agree that my data may be processed to respond to my request.
association_journal_description: Discover the latest updates from the field, volunteer stories, and upcoming charity events.
adjust_search_or_category: Try adjusting your search or category.
